ThingDef.label: crossbow
ThingDef.description: A medieval bow-like armament which launches bolts instead of arrows at relatively fast speeds. Easier to operate and more accurate than a bow in exchange of a lower fire rate.

ThingDef.label: flintlock pistol
ThingDef.description: An ancient pistol featuring a smoothbore barrel and a long, wooden grip ending in a knob. As its name implies, the flintlock pistol is operated by a flintlock mechanism.

ThingDef.label: flintlock blunderbuss
ThingDef.description: An ancient muzzle-loaded firearm with a short, large caliber barrel which is flared at the muzzle and frequently throughout the entire bore, and used with shot and other projectiles of relevant quantity or caliber. The blunderbuss is commonly considered to be an early predecessor of the modern shotgun, with similar military and defensive use.

ThingDef.label: flintlock musket
ThingDef.description: An ancient pattern musket. As one of the first of its kind, it only has short range and low fire rate.

ThingDef.label: S&W Governor
ThingDef.description: Ancient revolver designed for self-defense. Fires a powerful pistol cartridge as well as small shotgun shells.

ThingDef.label: Winchester 94
ThingDef.description: Ancient lever-action repeating rifle that became one of the most famous and popular hunting rifles of all time.

ThingDef.label: USAS-12
ThingDef.description: Ancient assault shotgun designed for full-auto fire in close quarters.

ThingDef.label: SIG MCX
ThingDef.description: An outdated carbine design, featuring a short-stroke gas piston system to improve reliability and reduce recoil.

ThingDef.label: AKMS-U
ThingDef.description: Ancient sub-carbine design, combining the firepower of a potent intermediate cartridge with the compactness of an SMG.

ThingDef.label: FN FAL
ThingDef.description: Ancient military battle rifle firing a full-power rifle cartridge. Famous for being the right hand of the free world.

ThingDef.label: AKM
ThingDef.description: Ancient military weapon chambered for an intermediate cartridge. The simple design makes it easy to assemble and gives it high reliability.

ThingDef.label: SVD
ThingDef.description: Ancient sniper rifle with a fairly simple assembly. It is known for its reliability.

ThingDef.label: Hecate II
ThingDef.description: Ancient bolt-action anti-materiel rifle. Combines a large caliber cartridge with a high-magnification scope for sniping at extreme range. Comes with a quick detachable stock for ease of transport.

ThingDef.label: PTRS-41
ThingDef.description: Ancient anti-tank rifle, originally designed for use against primitive armored vehicles. Fires a very powerful cartridge but the large size and weight make it unwieldy.

ThingDef.label: M249
ThingDef.description: Ancient belt-fed squad automatic weapon. It provides infantry squads with a high rate of machine gun fire, combined with the accuracy and portability of a rifle.

ThingDef.label: M60E6
ThingDef.description: Ancient belt-fed general-purpose machine gun. Lots of firepower but heavy and cumbersome to carry around. Commonly nicknamed "The Pig".

ThingDef.label: RPD
ThingDef.description: Ancient light machine gun design. The precursor to modern squad automatic weapons, it is comparatively light for a weapon of its class.

ThingDef.label: PKM
ThingDef.description: Ancient general-purpose machine gun. The rugged design makes it a popular weapon for the people inhabiting Rimworlds.

ThingDef.label: RPG-7
ThingDef.description: A short rocket-propelled grenade launcher that fires single projectiles which explode on impact. A relatively very cheap, multiple use alternative to single-shot launchers.

ThingDef.label: Milkor MGL
ThingDef.description: Ancient, man-portable grenade launcher. The 6-shot cylinder allows for a relatively high volume of fire.

ThingDef.label: P-6 charge pistol
ThingDef.description: Charged-shot pistol, commonly used by glitterworld police forces and mercenaries as a sidearm.

ThingDef.label: S-12 charge shotgun
ThingDef.description: Charged-shot shotgun, designed for maximum lethality in close-quarters combat.

ThingDef.label: S-6 charge SMG
ThingDef.description: Charged-shot bullpup sub-machine gun highly effective in close-quarters combat.

ThingDef.label: R-8 charge sniper rifle
ThingDef.description: Charged-shot sniper rifle equipped with advanced optics for long-range shooting.

ThingDef.label: L-8 charge LMG
ThingDef.description: Charged-shot light machine gun designed for suppression.

ThingDef.label: A-12 charge anti-materiel rifle
ThingDef.description: Charged-shot anti-materiel rifle equipped with advanced optics for long-range shooting.

ThingDef.label: RM2 Flamethrower
ThingDef.description: Unconventional flamethrower design that uses replaceable canisters of pressurized fuel canisters instead of a back-mounted tank. Less encumbering but needs to reload frequently.
